name: Restoration (itch) (0Null, Chikaxo, itisineo, CamCam253, HenkkaStorm)
description:
This game was made for the Finnish College Jam #4. The theme was Aetherpunk and there was 4 days to finish the game. Almost everyone in our team was from different schools. We have never seen each other and everything was made remotely through Discord.

Idea of the game

Your task is to collect the light orbs and bring them to correct animal statues so you can get through the portal to safety. Watch out for the darkness that is spreading!

Controls

Walking - WASD or arrow keys

Jump - Space 

Sprint - Shift

Picking up items - F

Slowing down time - E

Credits

Code - Kasper Kuirinlahti, Camilla Selkälä and Pinja Toivola

Audio - Henri Tikkala

Art - Neo Solehmainen, Kasper Kuirinlahti
